snippet.title: Garfield's Wild Ride - iOS/Android - Dreaming Hero (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Garfied's Wild Ride is available now for iOS and Android on smartphones and tablets.
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/garfields-wild-ride/id653364565?l=fr&ls=1&mt=8
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.namcobandaigames.garfieldwr

With so much time spent sleeping it's no surprise that Garfield dreams. A lot. And when he does, his normal lasagna-stuffed physical form is left in the dust by fantasy flying Garfield. Yes! In his dreams Garfield can fly! Who knew?

With simple single-finger gameplay to take to the air, players navigate Garfield through an ever more perilous series of hazards to complete 45 different missions across 5 wildly varied game worlds. Players can dress up Garfield in all kinds of crazy costumes from a spacesuit to a festive Santa outfit. Garfield may not be as tall as Santa, but he's sure got the girth.

For more information, please visit your local Namco Bandai website, http://www.namcobandaigames.eu
Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
Like us on Facebook! http://www.facebook.com/namcobandaigames.europe
